45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.subject: archiving
Importing comments to issue
45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.description: The customer wants to import slack thread comments to issue. The support rep asks if the customer wants to import slack thread comments to timeline. The customer confirms that they want to import slack thread comments to issue and then on the timeline.

45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.subject: is this going to produce a new conversation?
Reworked flows working for historic + live sync users and conversations
Not all conversations from Unthread are showing up
Customer wants to know what we need to do to consider the integration done.
so is this project closed other than comments?
Live sync of conversations every 5 minutes
How to test Unthread in a demo account
45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.description: The customer wants to test Unthread in a demo account, but the service rep says that they need dev support to do so. The customer also asks if huddles are comments, and the service rep says that they are not.

45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.subject: I can help you with it
Use Slack channel name if available to display in Slack channels
45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.description: The customer is asking the service rep to filter out the data that is missing the slack channel name. The service rep agrees to do so and asks the customer to provide them with a test account that they can use to play with. The customer provides the service rep with the credentials to a test account and the service rep is able to successfully filter out the data that is missing the slack channel name.

45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.subject: How to grab each conversation and invoke sync comments with conversation id
45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.description: The customer is asking for a way to retrieve the slack channel name from the slack channel id in unthread. The support rep provides a link to the documentation that shows how to do this. The customer says that there is no api to retrieve the slack channel name and that they need to do it via conversation api. The support rep says that they will start working to get the channel name directly from unthread.

45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.subject: Sync all except comments. Need to know the conversation ID for sync.
on it
45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.description: The customer is having an issue with the integration from unthread. The support rep is able to disable the integration and the customer is happy with the resolution.

45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.subject: <!here> Encord just connected unthread.  Are we able to sync data ahead of the call?
Workflow for syncing unthread data into a tenant
Do we have a demo account that I can test this on?
45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.description: The customer wants to test unthread in a demo account. The support rep provides a link to the demo unthread account. The customer asks where to find the API key to use in Integration.app. The support rep provides a link to the webhook key. The customer says that they don't want to test in the Openline tenant. The support rep asks how to test out of prod. The customer says that customers need to create a service account to get an api key.

45fc570f-288e-49a3-ad11-8fb9d4cec75d.subject: Picking a channel for an org is live in prod and working
give me 5 minutes
Customer needs a quick integration video to send to Encord team before they go home.
issue with comments from unthread import. need to work a bit the fields

comments.content: issue with comments from unthread import. need to work a bit the fields

<@U056ML7QYMU|Steyn Viljoen>
i would like to remove the external id from the issue card in timeline. looks quite ugly and usually the external ids are something ugly
That's supposed to be the issue number.
Someway for the team to internally identify the issues.
Is this id that you show here the actual issue number?
this is the code. definetly the external id and not an issue number
unthread doesn’t have the concept of issues. they have conversations
so no issue number for unthread
so, if that was supposed to be the issue number, we’re not doing it right now.
also, we are not syncing issue number from zendesk from what i see
i’ll comment that ugly id for now. we can enhance this later
All good
The ID does qualify the tag below it slightly though.
So if the tag just says Open, can I click that to open the issue?
Anyways, we can figure it out next week.

<https://linear.app/customer-os/issue/COS-2133/fe-associate-a-channel-on-the-issues-tab-to-an-organization>
Let's discuss after standup.
<@U046RGRAFSB|Matt Brown> would be possible to ask encord people to enable unthread in the settings? i would start importing their actual data today. the flow are done in integration app
yes, what do we need for them to enable?  API key?
Yes
<https://docs.unthread.io/api-introduction/using-api#create-a-service-account>
they need to create a service account and use the API KEY when they set unthread in settings
